knowledge.question: In networking and typically reserved for servers, which port numbers are considered "privileged" ports?
explanation: Correct: Ports below 1024 are special in that normal users are not allowed to run servers on them.
Incorrect: Although some ports of this range are priviledged only ports below 1024 are privileged ports.
Incorrect: Only ports below 1024 are privileged.
Incorrect: Only ports below 1024 are privileged.
